mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USERNAME, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, ROLE) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, USERNAME, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, ROLE, PROFILE_IMG_URL, BIRTH_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE FROM USER WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET PROFILE_IMG_URL = #{profileImgUrl}, BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate}, GENDER = #{gender}, UPDATE_DATE = NOW() WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
